mapper.select:
select t.id, t.owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, u.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, t.activityId, o.fullname as contactsId, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime
from tbl_tran t join tbl_contacts o on t.contactsId=o.id join tbl_customer u on t.customerId=u.id
